name: Game Room
longDes: You have entered the Game Room, this looks like fun. In the center of the room is a dusty pool table. To the West is a large picture window. Is that a picture of dogs playing poker on the wall? A fireplace stands on the east wall, and looks as if it hasnâ€™t been used in ages. There is a door with fogged glass to the North; You wonder where it leads. To the South is a door leading back to the library. To the southeast is a blue door that appears to lead to a small bathroom.
shortDes: You are in the mansion game room. A pool table occupies the center of the room, and a fireplace stands cold and dark. A window to the west looks out to woods adjacent to the house. There is a door to the north that leads to the solarium. A small blue door to the southwest goes to a small bathroom. To the South is a door to the library.
